Uses of Class
fotoshop.ColorImage

  • Packages that use ColorImage 
    Package Description
    fotoshop
    fotoshop package contains the primary image editor and various command processing methods.
    fotoshop.Filter
    Package containing the Filters that may be applied to the images being edited by the application.

    • Uses of ColorImage in fotoshop

      Retrieve the latest instance of the image

      Retrieve the ColorImage instance at the particular index

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add the image to the instance list, remove any elements that exceed the stackSize

      Constructor and Description

      Methods in fotoshop.Filter that return ColorImage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColorImage Filter.applyFilter(ColorImage image) 
      ColorImage MonoFilter.applyFilter(ColorImage image)
      apply the MonoFilter, making the target image monochrome
      ColorImage RotateFilter.applyFilter(ColorImage image)
      apply the RotateFilter, rotating 90 degrees
      ColorImage BrightnessFilter.applyFilter(ColorImage image, float i)
      apply the BrightnessFilter, adjusting the targets brightness
      ColorImage Filter.applyFilter(ColorImage image, float i) 
      ColorImage MonoFilter.applyFilter(ColorImage image, float i)
      Default applyFilter method, calls the applyFilter method.
      ColorImage RotateFilter.applyFilter(ColorImage image, float i)
      The default applyFilter method calls the applyFilter method i number of times
